#nullable enable
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Threading;
using System.Threading.Tasks;

namespace TestApp;
[global::System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(SkuTypeConverter))]
public partial struct Sku : global::System.IEquatable<Sku>, global::System.IComparable<Sku>, global::System.IFormattable

#if NET6_0_OR_GREATER
        , global::System.ISpanFormattable
#endif
#if NET7_0_OR_GREATER
        , global::System.IParsable<Sku>
        , global::System.ISpanParsable<Sku>
#endif
#if NET8_0_OR_GREATER
        , global::System.IUtf8SpanFormattable
#endif
{
    public static readonly Sku Empty = new Sku(string.Empty);
#if NET7_0_OR_GREATER
    public Sku(string value)
    {
        global::System.ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty(value);
        Value = value;
    }
#endif

#if !NET7_0_OR_GREATER
    public Sku(string value)
    {
        Value = value ?? throw new global::System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(value));
    }
#endif

    public string Value { get; }

    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IEquatable{{T}}"/>
    public bool Equals(Sku other)
    {
        return (Value, other.Value) switch
        {
            (null, null) => true,
            (null, _) => false,
            (_, null) => false,
            (_, _) => Value.Equals(other.Value, global::System.StringComparison.Ordinal),
        };
    }

    public override bool Equals(object? obj)
    {
        if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj))
            return false;
        return obj is Sku other && Equals(other);
    }

    public override int GetHashCode() => Value?.GetHashCode() ?? 0;
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IComparable{{TSelf}}"/>
    public int CompareTo(Sku other)
    {
        return (Value, other.Value) switch
        {
            (null, null) => 0,
            (null, _) => -1,
            (_, null) => 1,
            (_, _) => string.CompareOrdinal(Value, other.Value),
        };
    }

    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IFormattable"/>
    public string ToString(string? format, global::System.IFormatProvider? formatProvider) => Value ?? string.Empty;
#if NET6_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.ISpanFormattable"/>
    public bool TryFormat(global::System.Span<char> destination, out int charsWritten, global::System.ReadOnlySpan<char> format, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider)
    {
        var span = (Value ?? string.Empty).AsSpan();
        if (span.TryCopyTo(destination))
        {
            charsWritten = span.Length;
            return true;
        }

        charsWritten = 0;
        return false;
    }
#endif

#if NET6_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.ISpanFormattable"/>
    public bool TryFormat(global::System.Span<char> destination, out int charsWritten, global::System.ReadOnlySpan<char> format = default)
    {
        var span = (Value ?? string.Empty).AsSpan();
        if (span.TryCopyTo(destination))
        {
            charsWritten = span.Length;
            return true;
        }

        charsWritten = 0;
        return false;
    }
#endif

#if NET7_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IParsable{{TSelf}}"/>
    public static Sku Parse(string input, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider) => new(input);
#endif
#if NET7_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IParsable{{TSelf}}"/>
    public static bool TryParse(string? input, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider, out Sku result)
    {
        result = new(input ?? string.Empty);
        return true;
    }
#endif

#if NETCOREAPP2_1_OR_GREATER
    public static Sku Parse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan<char> input) => new(input.ToString());
#endif
#if NET6_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.ISpanParsable{{TSelf}}"/>
    public static Sku Parse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan<char> input, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider) => new(input.ToString());
#endif
#if NET6_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.ISpanParsable{{TSelf}}"/>
    public static bool TryParse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan<char> input, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider, out Sku result)
    {
        result = new(input.ToString());
        return true;
    }
#endif

#if NET8_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IUtf8SpanFormattable.TryFormat"/>
    public bool TryFormat(global::System.Span<byte> utf8Destination, out int bytesWritten, global::System.ReadOnlySpan<char> format, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider)
    {
        var bytes = global::System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Value ?? string.Empty);
        if (bytes.AsSpan().TryCopyTo(utf8Destination))
        {
            bytesWritten = bytes.Length;
            return true;
        }

        bytesWritten = 0;
        return false;
    }
#endif

    public override string ToString() => Value ?? "";
    public static Sku Parse(string input) => new(input);
    public static bool operator ==(Sku left, Sku right) => left.Equals(right);
    public static bool operator !=(Sku left, Sku right) => !(left == right);
    public static bool operator>(Sku a, Sku b) => a.CompareTo(b) > 0;
    public static bool operator <(Sku a, Sku b) => a.CompareTo(b) < 0;
    public static bool operator >=(Sku a, Sku b) => a.CompareTo(b) >= 0;
    public static bool operator <=(Sku a, Sku b) => a.CompareTo(b) <= 0;
    /// <summary>
    /// Implicitly converts a <see cref="String"/> to a <see cref="Sku"/>.
    /// </summary>
    public static implicit operator Sku(string value) => new Sku(value);
    /// <summary>
    /// Explicitly converts a <see cref="Sku"/> to its underlying <see cref="String"/> value.
    /// </summary>
    public static explicit operator string (Sku value) => value.Value;
    public partial class SkuTypeConverter : global::System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
    {
        public override bool CanConvertFrom(global::System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext? context, global::System.Type sourceType)
        {
            return sourceType == typeof(string) || base.CanConvertFrom(context, sourceType);
        }

        public override object? ConvertFrom(global::System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext? context, global::System.Globalization.CultureInfo? culture, object value)
        {
            return value switch
            {
                string stringValue => new Sku(stringValue),
                _ => base.ConvertFrom(context, culture, value),
            };
        }

        public override bool CanConvertTo(global::System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext? context, global::System.Type? sourceType)
        {
            return sourceType == typeof(string) || base.CanConvertTo(context, sourceType);
        }

        public override object? ConvertTo(global::System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext? context, global::System.Globalization.CultureInfo? culture, object? value, global::System.Type destinationType)
        {
            if (value is Sku idValue)
            {
                if (destinationType == typeof(string))
                    return idValue.Value;
            }

            return base.ConvertTo(context, culture, value, destinationType);
        }
    }
}
